description:
Introduction to HBase
What is HBase? Why would I use HBase? These questions will be answered as well as understanding what HBase is not suited for.

HBase Architecture
This section discusses the design of HBase and what the various components do. It goes into a detailed look at the storage implementation.

HBase shell and Java API
How to create tables, read and write rows in HBase using the shell or the Java API.

HBase Deployment
This section covers advice for installing and deploying an HBase instance. This includes managing logs, backups, hardware advice and tuning.
title: Introduction to HBase
